hr.p: I am a senior at Hope college pursuing dual degrees in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science.

br.em: An exploration of robotics in live music
br.br:
Building a robotic system to play bass guitar autonomously, combining robotics and live music.
Skills & Frameworks:
Ubuntu
Raspberry Pi
Python

A mobile application designed to improve real-time communication between drivers and roadside services.
Skills & Frameworks:
Spring Boot
Dart
Flutter
PostgreSQL

br.em: Analysis on the performance of CNN, KNN, and Logistic regression models on the CIFAR data set.
br.br:
Quantitative model performance comparison using confusion matrices, precision, accuracy, F1-score.
Skills & Frameworks:
Python
Jupyter Notebook
Keras
